hero.title: Communicate without
hero.subtitle: Meeshy automatically translates your messages in real-time using AI, directly in your browser. No data leaves your device.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.tagline: Connect the world, one translation at a time
mission.description: We believe that language barriers should never stand in the way of meaningful connections. Our platform empowers people from all corners of the globe to communicate freely, breaking down the walls that separate us and building bridges of understanding.

signature.line2: by developers who believe communication should have no boundaries.

universalTranslation.title: Universal Translation

autoDetection.title: Automatic Detection
autoDetection.description: Automatically detects message language for more accurate translation.

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.description: Client-side translation only. Your data stays on your device.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Meeshy, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Meeshy is a multilingual messaging platform that uses artificial intelligence to automatically translate messages in real-time. Our service enables communication without language barriers directly in your browser.

acceptableUse.title: 3. Acceptable Use
list: Use the service legally and respectfully
Not publish offensive, illegal or inappropriate content
Respect privacy and the rights of others
Not attempt to compromise service security
Not use the service for commercial purposes without authorization

privacy.title: 4. Privacy and Data
privacy.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Translations are performed locally in your browser when possible. No personal data is stored without your explicit consent. See our privacy policy for more details.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: Meeshy and its content are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify or distribute our service without authorization.

limitation.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Meeshy is provided "as is". We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free. We will not be liable for indirect or consequential damages resulting from the use of our service.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect upon their publication on this page. Your continued use of the service constitutes your acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms of use, please contact us at: contact@meeshy.com

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At Meeshy, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information when you use our multilingual messaging service.

translation.title: 2.2 Translation data
list: Translated messages (processed locally in your browser)

usage.title: 3. How we use your information
list: Service provision: Real-time translation of your messages
Service improvement: Development of new features
Customer support: Answering your questions and resolving issues
Security: Protection against abuse and fraud
Communication: Important information about the service

local.title: 4.1 Local processing
local.content: Most translations are performed directly in your browser, meaning your messages never leave your device.

encryption.title: 4.2 Encryption
encryption.content: All communications between your browser and our servers are encrypted using TLS 1.3.

storage.title: 4.3 Secure storage
storage.content: Data stored on our servers is protected by enterprise-level security measures, including encryption at rest.

sharing.title: 5. Information sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties, except in the following cases:
list: To comply with a legal obligation
To protect our rights, property or security
With trusted service providers (under confidentiality agreement)

rights.title: 6. Your rights
rights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:
list: Limit the processing of your data
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@meeshy.com

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and similar technologies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for service functionality and analytical cookies to improve user experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

modifications.title: 8. Modifications to this policy
modifications.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Important changes will be communicated by email or via a notification in the application. The last update date is indicated at the top of this page.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or the processing of your personal data, please contact us:
contact.address: Address: Tour First, 1 Place des Saisons, 92400 Courbevoie, France

about.title: About Meeshy
about.subtitle: We believe that communication should never be limited by language barriers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Meeshy, we strive to create a world where every conversation is possible, regardless of the language spoken. Our messaging platform with automatic translation enables people from all backgrounds to connect authentically and share their ideas without limitations.

globalAccess.title: Global Access
globalAccess.description: We make multilingual communication accessible to everyone, everywhere in the world.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We push the boundaries of translation technology to provide a seamless experience.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Your conversations remain private. Translation happens locally on your device.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a passionate team of developers, linguists, and designers working together to break down language barriers.
team.details: Based in France, we understand the importance of preserving cultural nuances in every conversation while facilitating mutual understanding.

cta.title: Want to learn more about our vision?

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We would love to discuss your multilingual communication needs with you.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Meeshy, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.content: Meeshy is a multilingual messaging service that enables real-time message translation. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the service at any time.

account.title: 3. User Account
account.intro: To use certain features of Meeshy, you must create an account. You agree to:
responsibilities: Maintain the security of your password
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
Be responsible for all activities under your account

usage.title: 4. Acceptable Use
usage.intro: You agree not to use the service to:
prohibited: Violate local, national, or international laws
Transmit illegal, offensive, or inappropriate content
Distribute viruses or other malicious code

content.title: 5. User Content
content.ownership: You retain ownership of any content you submit to Meeshy.
content.license: By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, modify, and distribute this content as part of the service.
content.responsibility: You are fully responsible for the content you share and warrant that it does not violate any third-party rights.

privacy.title: 6. Privacy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time, with or without notice, for any violation of these terms. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting us.

limitation.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Meeshy shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use of the service.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Significant changes will be notified by email or through the application. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

governing.title: 10. Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by French law. Any disputes will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of French courts.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.intro: For any questions regarding these terms of service, contact us:
contact.address: Address: Tour First, 1 Place des Saisons, 92400 Courbevoie, France
